text: The Night Coachman () is a 1928 Soviet silent movie directed by Georgi Tasin.Ночной извозчикНочной извозчик (1928) It stars Amvrosi Buchma, Maria Dyusimeter, and Nikolai Nademsky. == Actors == * Amvrosi Buchma as Gordey Yaroshchuk * Maria Dyusimeter as Katya * Nikolai Nademsky as Cossack * Yu. Shumsky as Secret Police officer * Karl Tomski as Boris == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1928 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Georgi Tasin
title: The Night Coachman
